thread.title: 'Sisterhood' at St. Dominic Academy spans generations
thread.title_full: 'Sisterhood' at St. Dominic Academy spans generations

author: Rev. Alexander Santora/For the Jersey Journal
title: 'Sisterhood' at St. Dominic Academy spans generations

organizations.name: siena hall of the academy of st. dominic

text: Membership in the venerable woman's club had declined and Dorethy McGrath, its last president, wanted to preserve the historic building and will it to an institution that supports women. So the member of the SDA Class of 1946 reached out to her alma mater and the building now continues as Siena Hall of the Academy of St. Dominic.
